statements: SELECT * FROM customer_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, complaint_date, resolution_status FROM customer_complaints WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT customer_name, complaint_date, resolution_status FROM customer_complaints WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY complaint_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, complaint_message FROM customer_complaints WHERE complaint_message LIKE '%poor service%';
SELECT customer_name, resolution_status, resolution_date FROM customer_complaints WHERE resolution_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC, complaint_id ASC
SELECT complaint_id, customer_name, complaint_message FROM customer_complaints WHERE resolution_status='Pending'
SELECT customer_name, resolution_status FROM customer_complaints WHERE resolution_status='Resolved' AND resolution_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT complaint_id, customer_name, complaint_date FROM customer_complaints WHERE complaint_message LIKE '%refund%'
SELECT customer_name, complaint_date, resolution_status FROM customer_complaints WHERE resolution_status='Closed' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_complaints;
SELECT customer_name, complaint_text FROM customer_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, resolution_text FROM customer_complaints WHERE resolution_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, complaint_text, resolution_text FROM customer_complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, resolution_text, resolution_date FROM customer_complaints JOIN resolution_history ON customer_complaints.id = resolution_history.complaint_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, complaint_text, complaint_date FROM customer_complaints WHERE resolution_text IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS num_complaints FROM customer_complaints GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT c.customer_name, r.resolution_text, r.resolution_date FROM customer_complaints c INNER JOIN resolution_history r ON c.id = r.complaint_id;

SELECT customer_name, complaint_text, complaint_date, resolution_text, resolution_date FROM customer_complaints LEFT JOIN resolution_history ON customer_complaints.id = resolution_history.complaint_id ORDER BY complaint_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints;
SELECT complaint_id, customer_id, complaint_text FROM CustomerComplaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ServiceAgents WHERE agent_department = 'Support' ORDER BY agent_name;
SELECT complaint_text, resolution_text, complaint_date, resolution_date FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE complaint_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-08-01' ORDER BY complaint_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, agent_department FROM ServiceAgents WHERE agent_department = 'Sales' ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' AND customer_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE resolution_date IS NULL ORDER BY complaint_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_description, complaint_date FROM Customer_Complaints WHERE resolution_status = 'Open';
SELECT resolution_id, complaint_id, resolution_description, resolved_date FROM Resolutions ORDER BY resolved_date DESC;
SELECT history_id, complaint_id, resolution_id, history_description, history_date FROM Complaint_History WHERE complaint_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_description, complaint_date FROM Customer_Complaints WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Customer_Complaints.complaint_description, Resolutions.resolution_description FROM Customers JOIN Customer_Complaints ON Customers.customer_id = Customer_Complaints.customer_id JOIN Resolutions ON Customer_Complaints.complaint_id = Resolutions.complaint_id WHERE Resolutions.resolved_date IS NOT NULL;

SELECT Customer_Complaints.complaint_id, Complaint_History.history_description FROM Customer_Complaints LEFT JOIN Complaint_History ON Customer_Complaints.complaint_id = Complaint_History.complaint_id ORDER BY Customer_Complaints.complaint_id ASC, Complaint_History.history_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT complaint_description, complaint_date, customer_id FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_date FROM resolutions WHERE complaint_id = 12345;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'Customer Service';
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY complaint_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email, complaints.complaint_description FROM customers JOIN complaints ON customers.customer_id = complaints.customer_id WHERE complaints.complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT employees.employee_name, departments.department_name, complaints.complaint_description FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name JOIN complaints ON complaints.customer_id = customers.customer_id;

SELECT complaints.complaint_id, complaints.complaint_description, resolutions.resolution_description FROM complaints LEFT JOIN resolutions ON complaints.complaint_id = resolutions.complaint_id WHERE resolutions.resolution_date IS NULL;

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.phone_number, COUNT(complaints.complaint_id) AS total_complaints FROM customers LEFT JOIN complaints ON customers.customer_id = complaints.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING total_complaints > 3;
